item.title: Helps with commands
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

OFFTOPIC: perhaps maybe you should try and learn Delta for yourself, it is quite easy…

Anyway what you need is this…

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("Your server name", 8144); //title sendQuest("scroll down for commands", 8145); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("command 1", 8148); sendQuest("command 2", 8149); sendQuest("command 3", 8150); sendQuest("command 4", 8151); sendQuest("command 5", 8152); sendQuest("^ continued", 8153); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); sM("Commands"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Helps with commands
item.dc:creator: @swebbyscape swebbyscape
item.description:
@swebbyscape wrote:

Okay no problem first

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands") && (playerRights >= 0)) {//if you right ::commands it will work for all String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@dre@Server name commands", 8144); //Title of Server sendQuest("Scrol down, there are more rules..", 8145); clearQuestInterface();//opens the thing it sais it on sendQuest("::rules", 8148);//first command sendQuest("::home", 8149);//2nd sendQuest("::customs", 8150);//3rd sendQuest("::kbd", 8151);//4th sendQuest("::mithdrags", 8152);//5th sendQuest("::gw", 8153);//6th sendQuest("::staffzone ~~ mod+ only", 8154);//7th sendQuest("::donorzone ~~ Donors only.", 8155);//8th sendQuest("@cya@Updated@bla@::rarelist", 8156);//9th sendQuest("::ele", 8157);//10th sendQuest("@whi@NEW!@bla@::Gambling", 8158);//11th sendQuest("@whi@NEW!@bla@::maxhit", 8159);//12th sendQuest("@whi@NEW!@bla@::highscores", 8160);//14th sendQuest("@dre@Thanks for playing", 8161);//15 sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); sM("remember each command starts with :: and all lowercase.");//sends you this message }

Okay now if u need to add more commands just add for rows so the next one would be
sendQuest("::command", 8162);
then 8163
then 8164 and on and on and on…

if u need more help understanding write back and ask as much or as little as you want.
Sorry for spelling btw i suck

Read full topic
